projects.title: DE-Studio agency (Frontend)
projects.description: DE STUDIO is a modern, fully responsive agency website showcasing brand identity, web design, and development services. It's a frontend-only project with all dynamic content (projects, testimonials, team members, FAQs) managed through JSON data structures for easy maintenance.

projects.title: Heirloom App (Backend)
projects.description: Heirloom is a unique mobile app that uses AI to create a personalized “digital legacy.” It connects users with their loved ones by continuing conversations even after they’re gone, based on data from their interactions..

projects.title: Chatcrypt Web Application
projects.description: Chatcrypt is a secure, anonymous chat app that stores messages temporarily and deletes them daily for privacy. It supports real-time chats, media sharing, and server status monitoring. Built with Node.js, React, and hosted on Render.

projects.title: Word Bound – Multiplayer Word Game
projects.description: Developed a multiplayer word game where players take turns forming words that start with the last letter of the previous word. Includes a real-time typing preview system, allowing players to see the other player’s typing as they type, enhancing the interaction and experience.
